alert.note: Alert for Brooke; Hancock; Marion; Marshall; Monongalia; Ohio; Wetzel (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued July 29 at 6:58AM EDT until July 29 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 564 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 11 AM EDT THIS MORNING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN OHIO THIS WATCH INCLUDES 7 COUNTIES IN EAST CENTRAL OHIO BELMONT CARROLL COLUMBIANA HARRISON JEFFERSON OH MONROE NOBLE IN PENNSYLVANIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 6 COUNTIES IN SOUTHWEST PENNSYLVANIA ALLEGHENY GREENE WASHINGTON IN WEST CENTRAL PENNSYLVANIA BUTLER IN WESTERN PENNSYLVANIA BEAVER LAWRENCE IN WEST VIRGINIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 7 COUNTIES IN NORTHERN WEST VIRGINIA MARION MONONGALIA WETZEL IN THE NORTHERN PANHANDLE OF WEST VIRGINIA BROOKE HANCOCK MARSHALL OHIO THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALIQUIPPA, AMBRIDGE, BEAVER FALLS, BUTLER, CADIZ, CALDWELL, CANONSBURG, CARROLLTON, COLUMBIANA, EAST LIVERPOOL, ELLWOOD CITY, FAIRMONT, FOLLANSBEE, MARTINS FERRY, MONACA, MORGANTOWN, MOUNDSVILLE, NEW CASTLE, NEW MARTINSVILLE, PITTSBURGH METRO AREA, SALEM, ST. CLAIRSVILLE, STEUBENVILLE, WASHINGTON, WAYNESBURG, WEIRTON, WELLSBURG, WHEELING, AND WOODSFIELD.

area.areaDesc: Brooke; Hancock; Marion; Marshall; Monongalia; Ohio; Wetzel
